theApex:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theApex:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theApex:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theApex:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theApex:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theApex:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theApex:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theApex:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theApex:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theApex:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theApex:SplinterArrow.NAME: Splinter Arrow
theApex:SplinterArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all Enemies. NL Exhaust.

theApex:FireArrow.NAME: FireArrow
theApex:FireArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an Enemy. NL Exhaust.
theApex:FireArrow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an Enemy. NL Retain. NL Exhaust

theApex:HeavyArrow.NAME: HeavyArrow
theApex:HeavyArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an Enemy. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

theApex:RazorArrow.NAME: RazorArrow
theApex:RazorArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

theApex:WallArrow.NAME: Wall Arrow
theApex:WallArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust

theApex:HeartSeekingArrow.NAME: Heart Seeking Arrow
theApex:HeartSeekingArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy X times. NL Exhaust

theApex:LaelapsArrow.NAME: Laelaps Arrow
theApex:LaelapsArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy. NL If the enemy is killed by this card, permanently increase this cards Damage by !M!. NL Exhaust

theApex:VampiricArrow.NAME: Vampiric Arrow
theApex:VampiricArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy and Heal for an equivalent amount. HP. NL Exhaust.

theApex:SwarmArrow.NAME: Swarm Arrow
theApex:SwarmArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy !M! Times. NL Exhaust.

theApex:TaintedArrow.NAME: Tainted Arrow
theApex:TaintedArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength for one turn. NL Exhaust.

theApex:FireworkArrow.NAME: Firework Arrow
theApex:FireworkArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

theApex:AcceleratingArrow.NAME: Accelerating Arrow
theApex:AcceleratingArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy. NL Damage Increases this cards Damage by !M! this combat. NL Exhaust
theApex:AcceleratingArrow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy. NL Damage Increases this cards Damage by !M! this combat.

theApex:BlindingArrow.NAME: Blinding Arrow
theApex:BlindingArrow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Inflict !M! Weak to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

theApex:Pounce.NAME: Pounce
theApex:Pounce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy. NL Gain !M! Temporary Strength.

theApex:DualSlash.NAME: Dual Slash
theApex:DualSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy !M! times.

theApex:QuickStab.NAME: Quick Stab
theApex:QuickStab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! Card.

theApex:PreciseStab.NAME: Precise Stab
theApex:PreciseStab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy. NL Inflict !M! Bleed.

theApex:HeavySlash.NAME: Heavy Slash
theApex:HeavySlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy. NL Ethereal.

theApex:BeastFang.NAME: Beast Fang
theApex:BeastFang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy. NL Retain. NL Exhaust.

theApex:ForThePride.NAME: For The Pride
theApex:ForThePride.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Beast Fangs to your Hand.
theApex:ForThePride.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Upgraded Beast Fangs to your Hand.

theApex:Overexert.NAME: Overexert
theApex:Overexert.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card for every card played this turn, draw !M! next turn

theApex:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
theApex:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Energy next turn. NL Exhaust

theApex:HuntTheHunter.NAME: Hunt The Hunter
theApex:HuntTheHunter.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !theApex:SecondMagic! Temporary Strength.

theApex:FightAndFlight.NAME: Fight And Flight
theApex:FightAndFlight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Energy NL Start next turn with !theApex:SecondMagic! Energy. NL Exhaust
theApex:FightAndFlight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Energy NL Start nex turn with !theApex:SecondMagic! Energy. NL Exhaust NL Retain

theApex:BaitTrap.NAME: Bait Trap
theApex:BaitTrap.DESCRIPTION: Give all enemies !M! Vulnerable next turn.

theApex:NemianHide.NAME: Nemian Hide
theApex:NemianHide.DESCRIPTION: Grant !M! Dexterity for !theApex:SecondMagic! turns. NL Exhaust.

theApex:KingOfTheSkies.NAME: King of the Skies
theApex:KingOfTheSkies.DESCRIPTION: All attacks cost -1 for this turn. NL Exhaust.

theApex:PackHunter.NAME: Pack Hunter
theApex:PackHunter.DESCRIPTION: Start each turn with a Beast Fang in your hand for !M! turns.
theApex:PackHunter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Start each turn with an Upgraded Beast Fang in your hand for !M! turns.

theApex:ThornySpines.NAME: Thorny Spines
theApex:ThornySpines.DESCRIPTION: Generate !M! Thorns for !theApex:SecondMagic! turns. NL Exhaust.

theApex:StoneScales.NAME: Stone Scales
theApex:StoneScales.DESCRIPTION: Block doesn't Degenerate for !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

theApex:Camouflage.NAME: Camouflage
theApex:Camouflage.DESCRIPTION: Gain Intangible until an attack is played.

theApex:EagleEye.NAME: Eagle Eye
theApex:EagleEye.DESCRIPTION: All Arrow Attacks gain !M! Damage for !theApex:SecondMagic! turns. NL Exhaust.

theApex:ArrowRecovery.NAME: Arrow Recovery
theApex:ArrowRecovery.DESCRIPTION: Return an exhausted Arrow Card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theApex:ScrapBunny.NAME: Scrap Bunny
theApex:ScrapBunny.DESCRIPTION: Return !M! random Exhausted Cards to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theApex:ScrapChinchilla.NAME: Scrap Chinchilla
theApex:ScrapChinchilla.DESCRIPTION: Return a random exhausted card to the top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
theApex:ScrapChinchilla.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return an random exhausted card to the top of your draw pile.

theApex:Eclipse.NAME: Eclipse
theApex:Eclipse.DESCRIPTION: Returns all exhausted cards into your draw pile. NL Exhaust
theApex:Eclipse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return all exhausted cards into your draw pile.

theApex:SoundTrap.NAME: Sound Trap
theApex:SoundTrap.DESCRIPTION: The next time the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Temporary Dexterity.

theApex:KnifeTrap.NAME: Knife Trap
theApex:KnifeTrap.DESCRIPTION: The next time the enemy intends to attack, deal !D! Damage and inflict !M! Bleed.

theApex:GraveTrap.NAME: Grave Trap
theApex:GraveTrap.DESCRIPTION: The next time the enemy intends to attack, play three random exhausted cards. NL Exhaust

theApex:StickyTrap.NAME: Sticky Trap
theApex:StickyTrap.DESCRIPTION: The next time the enemy intends to attack, inflict !M! Weak.
theApex:StickyTrap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next time the enemy intends to attack, inflict !M! Weak and !theApex:SecondMagic! Vulnerable.

theApex:FelineBalance.NAME: Feline Balance
theApex:FelineBalance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block at the beginning of your turn for !M! turns.

theApex:FullMoon.NAME: Full Moon
theApex:FullMoon.DESCRIPTION: Double the potency of Forms for !M! turns. NL Exhaust
theApex:FullMoon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple the potency of Forms for !M! turns. NL Exhaust

theApex:ScrapTiger.NAME: Scrap Tiger
theApex:ScrapTiger.DESCRIPTION: Return !M! cards from your Exhaust pile into your hand. They cost !theApex:SecondMagic! this turn. NL Exhaust

theApex:Abandon.NAME: Abandon
theApex:Abandon.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

theApex:BecomeTheApex.NAME: Become the Apex
theApex:BecomeTheApex.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. NL -2 Draw for !theApex:SecondMagic! turns.

theApex:BlessingOfApollo.NAME: Blessing of Apollo
theApex:BlessingOfApollo.DESCRIPTION: The first Arrow Card shot each turn is played !M! times.

theApex:BlessingOfNemesis.NAME: Blessing of Nemesis
theApex:BlessingOfNemesis.DESCRIPTION: Each time you take damage, temporarily lower the strength of all enemies by !M!.

theApex:AfterTheHunt.NAME: After The Hunt
theApex:AfterTheHunt.DESCRIPTION: Heal equal to the number of Arrow cards in your exhaust pile.

theApex:BlessingOfTheOcean.NAME: Blessing of the Ocean
theApex:BlessingOfTheOcean.DESCRIPTION: Inflict !M! Bleed to the enemy for each unblocked attack landed.

theApex:BlessingOfShekmet.NAME: Blessing of Shekmet
theApex:BlessingOfShekmet.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength at the beginning of every turn.

theApex:BlessingOfAegis.NAME: Blessing of Aegis
theApex:BlessingOfAegis.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity at the beginning of every turn.

theApex:BlessingOfHephaestus.NAME: Blessing of Hephaestus
theApex:BlessingOfHephaestus.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the first card used each turn.

theApex:BathingInBlood.NAME: Bathing in Blood
theApex:BathingInBlood.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card exhausts gain !M! Block

theApex:ScrapHound.NAME: Scrap Hound
theApex:ScrapHound.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of your turn return an exhausted card to your draw pile.

theApex:ScrapFox.NAME: Scrap Fox
theApex:ScrapFox.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn return an exhausted card to your discard pile.
